description:
*New Excel content added January 2016*

Microsoft Office Excel is one of the global power tools of the world.

Every business uses it. So a basic level and understanding of Excel is needed.

This Excel tutorial course aims to give you that.

This very short Excel course will simply teach you in Excel 2016, how to do the following:

1) Excel maths operations- How to add,subtract, multiply and divide

2) Teach concepts related to writing formulas in Excel

Each lecture is simple and concise and there are short quizzes to reinforce your knowledge. All lectures are fully English subtitled too.

Thanks for reading this and I look forward to seeing you on the other side!
title: Excel 2016 Course: Learn Maths + Formulas In 1 Hour With CC
